front.title: Mobile IPv6 Flow Routing over Multiple Care-of Addresses

abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism to selectively route IP flows toand from Mobile IPv6 Mobile Nodes and NEMO Mobile Routers which haveregistered multiple care-of addresses. It explains how to apply thegeneric flow distribution language defined in a companion draft toMobile IPv6, defines a transport mechanism to transmit the rulesbetween Mobile IPv6 nodes, and describes how the rules are sent andhandled upon reception.
